description: '''Playa Fly''' (born '''Ibn Young'''; September 2, 1977) is an American [[rapping|rapper]] from [[Memphis, Tennessee]]. Pursuing a solo career as Playa Fly, he released one independent album before signing a three-album contract with Super Sigg Records. During that period he had many underground hits, perhaps the most famous being "Nobody Needs Nobody". Fly's early hit immediately gained notoriety from the song "Triple Bitch Mafia", which lashed out against his former group.
